scenario_text.value:
What do you mean?
I’m tip-top shape every day!

...I wish I could say that.
Actually, I can’t deny feeling a little down.

I thought so.
Kaito’s been really cold to you, huh?
I know he keeps treating me like crap...

But still, all I wanna do is protect him with
all my might.

I’m pretty sure I’d still want to protect
Takuma even if he said something mean to me.

I guess it helps that I don’t take things too
personally.

Shouldn’t you be more worried about
someone else?

(He must mean Falcomon.
Since Falcomon’s so serious and focused...)

(He might be taking Minoru’s words to
heart...)
Thanks, I’ll keep that in mind.

We’re almost done exploring here.
Where’d the professor go?
